name: Web and Data mining and many things in between
body:
### Hi! I'm Adam. I've been a software engineer for a few years now. I favor doing projects in the realm of data mining. I dropped out of my college (3 years in) to focus on a little freelancing gig and go through an accelerator to learn the ropes of business. I saw how hard it was to start a business, chase your own clients, but loved the challenge.

I discovered however, that I wasn't satisfied doing web consulting as much, so I took whatever time I could to do data mining. Here I am now, doing data forecasting, implementing question answering systems, and my current project:

https://www.mashape.com/agibsonccc/semantic-analytics


I'm looking to use my own API as a basis for selling various products. My first idea is going to be data extraction/scraping software a cut above what's been produced out there. If you have any uses, or just want to reach out, please email me at agibson@clevercloudcomputing.com
or skype me at: agibsonccc.

Thanks!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
